comment.author: 82395331@N00
comment._content: This could be paraphrased as such if this were today: Snake oil interests are now said to be seeking control of the health care industry.

comment.author: 56204467@N04
comment._content: The turpentine industry was the heart and soul of the Southeastern United States. Also known as the Naval Stores Industry, highly sought supplies of pitch, tar and turpentine was created from the resinous sap of the pine tree. I find it interesting that war in Europe caused Naval Stores work to start in the British Colonies and War in Europe (WWI) was the beginning of the end for the turpentine industry in the U.S.
